column4: Can someone give a newbie some help? second day using Ubuntu.. now Im stuck.

I clicked 'Advanced' in the appearence preferences.. Now the dialog box is 'locked' I need to get it closed some how.. I heard something about rkill or kill in the terminal.. how do i reference it to this dialog box?
AndChat, I just type xkill in the terminal and it will auto close the Appereance Preferences and nothing else?
I like that.. *takes note of xkill*
xkill changes your mouse cursor into a hitman, click the window to kill
I did.. but the damn window just came back.. The Appearance Preferences.

I clicked 'Advanced' in the appearence preferences.. Now the dialog box is 'locked' I need to get it closed some how.. I heard something about rkill or kill in the terminal.. how do i reference it to this dialog box?
besides the rkill and kill subjects* sorry I just pressed up instead of retyping.
I think im going to have to reboot..
nothing seems to be working. lol
logout - login when needed; reboot only necessary with kernel update or really bad crash
